mapper.sql: id, title, content, summary, author, status, user_id, category_id, favorit_num, comment_num, year, month, day, word_count, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into ms_article( title, content, summary, author, status, user_id, category_id, favorit_num, comment_num, year, month, day, word_count, create_time ) values( #{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{author}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{favoritNum}, #{commentNum}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{wordCount}, #{createTime} );
mapper.update: update ms_article set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
update ms_article set status =1 where id =#{id}
mapper.delete: update ms_article set status =1 where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from ms_article where (#{title}='' or title like "%"#{title}"%") and status =0 and (-1 = -1 or category_id = ${categoryId}) and user_id =${userId}

select
from ms_article where (#{title}='' or title like "%"#{title}"%") and status = 0 and ( -1 = -1 or category_id = ${categoryId}) and user_id =${userId} order by create_time desc limit #{from},#{size};
